en.title: Enter the date of your Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority initial review decision letter
en.line1: You can find this on your CICA initial review decision letter
en.dateOfCicaInitialReviewDecisionLetterLab: Date of CICA initial review decision letter

cy.title: Pwy yw testun yr achos hwn?

initialCicaDecisionDate.invalid: Date of CICA initial review decision letter must be a real date
initialCicaDecisionDate.invalidAndIncomplete: Date of CICA initial review decision letter must be a real date and must include a day, month and year

initialCicaDecisionDate.incompleteDayAndYear: Date of CICA initial review decision letter must include a day and year
initialCicaDecisionDate.incompleteMonthAndYear: Date of CICA initial review decision letter must include a month and year
initialCicaDecisionDate.incompleteDayAndMonthAndYear: Date of CICA initial review decision letter must include a day, month and year
